title: Whisper V3 large + WatsonX.ai Speech Transcription
author: Sohan M
description:
This Python file utilises a French fine-tuned Whisper v3 large model for transcription. Manual diarization is performed, and the results are then passed to Watsonx for summary generation and entity extraction.
The Whisper model is sourced from Hugging Face. Please paste your Hugging Face API key.
